modal.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete the following node? You can restore it from the trash.
modal.confirm_reset_rconfig: Are you sure you want to reset the root configuration? This will attempt to recreate the configuration based on the current files and folders in the root path. Any order changes will be lost.
modal.confirm_fix_folder: Are you sure you want to fix this folder? This will attempt to recreate contents attached to the folder.
modal.root_not_set: Root path is not set. Please set the root path first.
modal.change_not_saved: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to save the changes?

exceptions.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred. Please report this issue in GitHub.
exceptions.invalid_parameter: An invalid config key is passed. This shall not happen. Please report this issue in GitHub.
exceptions.exe_path_not_found: Failed to get the application executable path. Please report this issue in GitHub.
exceptions.already_exists: The same element already exists in the target location.
exceptions.too_many_nodes: Oh no! You have too many nodes in the root folder. How could this happen? Why do you have over 2^32 nodes?

get_gconfig.read_error: Failed to read global configuration file. The file may be corrupted. Try deleting the file and restarting the application. Path: app_folder://config.json

set_gconfig.cannot_delete_file: Cannot delete global configuration file. Please check if the application has permission to change the app folder.
set_gconfig.cannot_create_file: Cannot create global configuration file. Please check if the application has permission to write to the app folder.
set_gconfig.write_error: Failed to write to global configuration file. Please check if the application has permission to write to the app folder.

get_rconfig.read_error: Failed to read file. Please check if the application has permission
get_rconfig.invalid_parameter: The root is invalid. Try setting the root path again.

set_rconfig.cannot_delete_file: Cannot delete root configuration file. Please check if the application has permission to change the root folder.
set_rconfig.cannot_create_file: Cannot create root configuration file. Please check if the application has permission to write to the root folder.
set_rconfig.write_error: Failed to write to root configuration file. Please check if the application has permission to write to the root folder.

rename_node.invalid_operation: Failed to rename the node. Please make sure the node exists and the new name is valid.

create_node.invalid_parameter: The node parent is invalid. The root configuration file may be corrupted. Try fixing the file in the root menu
create_node.cannot_create_file: Failed to create file or folder. Please make sure the application has permission to write to the root folder.

move_node_to_trash.cannot_delete_file: Failed to delete file or folder. Please make sure the node exists and the application has permission to change the root folder.

move_node.invalid_parameter: The node or target parent is invalid. The root configuration file may be corrupted. Try fixing the file in the root menu
move_node.invalid_operation: Failed to move the node. Please make sure the node and target parent exist.

get_node_by_id.invalid_parameter: The node is invalid. The root configuration file may be corrupted. Try fixing the file in the root menu

get_node_contents.read_error: Failed to read the file content. Please make sure the file exists and the application has permission to read from the root folder.

update_node_contents.file_not_found: The file to write to is not found. Try fixing the root configuration file in the root menu.
update_node_contents.write_error: Failed to write to the file. Please make sure the file exists and the application has permission to write to the root folder.

open_in_explorer.invalid_operation: Failed to open the file location in explorer. Please make sure the file or folder exists.

exceptions.set_title_failed: Failed to set application title. This shall not happen. Please report this issue in GitHub.
